text: Σὺ οὖν, ἐὰν προσκυνήσῃςπροσκυνησης rell ¦ προσκυνησεις [15%] ἐνώπιον ἐμοῦ,εμου f35 ℵB,D,W [65%] CP,HF,RP,NU ¦ μου A [35%] TR,OC ἔσται σοὶσοι f35 [25%] ¦ σου ℵA,B,D,W [75%] CP,HF,RP,TR,OC,NU πᾶσα.»πασα f35 ℵA,B,D [98%] CP,HF,RP,OC,NU ¦ παντα W [2%] TR [It will be observed that this is the third variant set within the space of four words, and within these sets the attestation varies considerably. In the main, the copyists tried to reproduce faithfully what was in front of them.]
